item.description:
Greetings Everyone!

Will you be looking for a way to burn those Thanksgiving calories? I will. Let’s walk them off at the Minute Man National Historical Park in Concord. If you haven’t been there before, it’s very scenic and historical!
The terrain is even, making it a nice walk for all levels.

Meet at Lexington Rd. Meriam’s Corner parking area, which marks the entrance to the Minute Man National Historical Park. Lexington Rd. connects downtown Concord to Rt. 2A.

Landmarks on Lexington Rd. include Louisa May Alcott's Orchard House and the Hawthorne Inn.

Hope to see you there!

Yoris

For a park map click here.
item.name: Walk at Minuteman Historic National Park: RESCHEDULED DUE TO RAIN
